replies.bodyText:
comment from scott:
Fujitsu supports a different COBOL syntax than IBM (similar, but there are differences).  we should be using the IBM syntax instead:
https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SS6SG3_4.2.0/com.ibm.entcobol.doc_4.2/PGandLR/igy3lr50.pdf
If you look at page 211 (PDF page 233), you will see how picture clauses are defined.
